name: Stored Power
effect: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move for each positive Stat Change the User has. Up to 7 Dice may be added this way. (ie. the User has 2 increases to Special and 1 Evasion, add 3 Damage dice).
description: This move allows the user to release its power. If the user has any boosts, the damage is increased.
